title: Universal Mushroom Avoidance Rule
brief: Avoid all mushrooms in survival situations due to identification difficulties and fatal risks.
steps: Step 1: Never eat any mushroom, regardless of appearance or local advice.
Step 2: Understand that mushroom identification requires precise expertise impossible in field conditions.
Step 3: Remember that some mushrooms cause death very quickly with no known antidote.
Step 4: Focus foraging efforts on other plant foods with clearer identification markers.
warnings: Some mushrooms kill within hours with no antidote available.
Even expert identification can be wrong without laboratory analysis.
Death from mushroom poisoning can occur from a single small bite.
